title: Pour Brothers celebrates one year
text:
Pour Brothers celebrates one year Josie Sexton , jsexton@coloradoan.com 4:49 p.m. MDT October 1, 2015 Pour Brothers Community Tavern will celebrate its one-year anniversary Friday and Saturday. (Photo: Coloradoan library) CONNECT 2 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Need an anniversary to celebrate this weekend? 
Pour Brothers Community Tavern will celebrate its one-year anniversary Friday and Saturday nights at the Linden Street bar. 
Friday night will feature a tap takeover by New Belgium, Horse & Dragon and Snowbank breweries. 
Saturday, the bar will host a murder mystery game for patrons to partake in. 
WHERE: Pour Brothers Community Tavern, 220 Linden St. 
WHEN: 5:30 p.m. Friday and 8 p.m. Saturday Read or Share this story: http://noconow.co/1FJtfPO
